changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.product_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, product bigint NOT NULL, attribute bigint NOT NULL, numeric_value numeric, integer_value integer, boolean_value boolean, text_value character varying, timestamp_value timestamp, binary_value bytea, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, unit bigint, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT product_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT product_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_attribute_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_attribute_unit_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_attribute_key UNIQUE (product , attribute, sequence_number), CONSTRAINT product_attribute_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0), CONSTRAINT product_attribute_valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(boolean_value) + ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(timestamp_value) + ruleform.null_zero(binary_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
